name: Patron's Bond
entries: At 6th level, the bond between you and your minion is strengthened to the point where you can share magical effects. When you heal hit points through the casting of a spell your minion regains an equal amount and vice versa. Likewise when you cast a spell that targets only self, it affects your minion as well if they are within 30 feet when you cast it.
Your minion can become medium and any future minions you summon can be medium as well.
